remarks: The limit points of a subset restrict naturally in a subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
statement:
restcls.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
restcls.2 $e |- K = ( J |`t Y ) $.
restlp $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ Y C_ X /\ S C_ Y ) -> ( ( limPt ` K ) ` S ) = ( ( ( limPt ` J ) ` S ) i^i Y ) ) $.
